description: Try our easy to follow Easy Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Fish,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Easy Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 pkt Yellowfin Tuna In Chilli & Oil (see Note)

recipeInstructions.text: Place eggs into a saucepan and cover with cold water. Stir constantly over a high heat until water comes to the boil. Reduce heat to medium and simmer for 8 minutes. Drain and cool under cold running water.
Blanch beans in boiling water for 3 minutes or until just tender but still crisp. Drain and refresh in iced water. Pack into a snap lock bag with cooked eggs.
Place salad dressing into a small sealable container.

Pack all salad components into a sealable container. At the picnic, empty coleslaw into container. Peel and quarter eggs, then add to the salad with beans. Flake tuna and add to salad. Drizzle with dressing and serve. note: these pouches of tuna are great – they aren’t as heavy as canned products and you won’t need to remember to take a can opener!
